knimeNode.name: Expand bitvector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Expands the bitvector to individual integer columns.

intro.p: This node splits the bitvector to integer columns.
The Bitvector Generator node generates some position and name information as column properties. You can use that information in this node.

tab.name: Standard Options
tab.option: Should we remove the selected bitvector column?

option.name: Use the column indexes specified in properties?

tab.option: The new columns will be put to the specified indices if they are available.
The available names are used instead of the generated if possible.
New column names start with this prefix.

option.name: Start index for the first new column

tab.option: The numeric part of the column will start from this index.
The values after this index in the bitvector will be omitted from the output table.

ports.inPort: Table containing at least one bitvector column.
